name: WE RISE BY LIFTING OTHERS
description:
You are someone they know and respect as List Master. The apartment complex is renovating, and you are tasked with watching the elevator and ride across floors. Different people live here. Some are good, some... not so much. It's just a week of work for you, but how will it end? Can you affect the course of story? Will you be the one pushing buttons and decide fates of residents? Or... You are just an observer of events?

Credits:
SilverCat - Writer
Coolebyaka - Developer
